articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spreads to Women Officials
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spreads to Women Officials
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent the 70th birthday spreads to labor hero Pang Ae Son, advisor to the North Phyongan Provincial Rural Economy Committee, and labor hero Kim Myong Yon, chairwoman of the Management Board of the Jangchon Vegetable Cooperative Farm in Sadong District, Pyongyang.
					 Pang, who was born into a peasant family, devoted herself to increasing grain production while working in the field of agriculture for a long time.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung highly appreciated her doing farming without any help of volunteers and ensured that her experience was generalized.
					
					 In this period she became an official in charge of agriculture of a province and labor hero.
					
					 Kim Myong Yon has also contributed to improving the people's living standard with a bumper vegetable crop while working as the leader of a work-team and then as chairwoman of the management board under the care of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 After being highly praised by the President at the national agricultural conference held in Jan. Juche 63 (1974), Kim Myong Yon worked heart and soul for decades.
					
					 Kim Jong Un let Pang and Kim who have firmly defended the agricultural front participate in the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea as delegates.

articles.title: Greetings to 27th Ordinary Session of AU Summit
articles.content:
Greetings to 27th Ordinary Session of AU Summit
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a message of greeting to the 27th Ordinary Session of the African Union (AU) Summit.
					 In the message he expressed the belief that the summit discussing and deciding on practical issues for achieving the continental political and economic integration, peace and stability and regional development and prosperity with the "African Year of Human Rights with Particular Focus on the Rights of Women, 2016" as its main theme would register good success amid the active enthusiasm of all the participants.
					
					 Reaffirming the steadfast stand of the DPRK to further develop the relations of friendship and cooperation with the AU and its member nations, the message hoped that the summit would be an important occasion in promoting the prosperity and sustainable development of Africa.

articles.title: Greetings to Minister of Foreign Affairs and European Integration of Montenegro
articles.content:
Greetings to Minister of Foreign Affairs and European Integration of Montenegro
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a message of greeting to Igor Luksic, vice prime minister and minister of Foreign Affairs and European Integration of Montenegro, on Wednesday on its national day.
					 Expressing belief that the exchange and cooperation between the two foreign ministries to develop the friendly relations between the two countries would be close, the message wished him success in his work.

articles.title: Credentials to DPRK FM from UNIDO Representative
articles.content:
Credentials to DPRK FM from UNIDO Representative
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Ho, foreign minister of the DPRK, Wednesday received credentials from Ralf Bredel, representative of the UNIDO here.

articles.title: U.S. Should Be Sternly Judged as Heinous War Criminal State, Human Rights Abuser: Spokesman for DPRK FM
articles.content:
U.S. Should Be Sternly Judged as Heinous War Criminal State, Human Rights Abuser: Spokesman for DPRK FM
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPR of Korea gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA on Wednesday as regards the announcement of an official report in UK on unreasonable Iraqi war:
					 At the end of its seven-year survey, the committee for the probe into the truth about the Iraqi war, organized by the UK government in 2009, announced a report concluding that the Iraqi war ignited by the U.S. in 2003 was illegal and unreasonable.
					
					 The report noted that the U.S. allegation about Iraq's "production of biochemical weapons" and the "threat of its WMDs", a direct motive of the war, was totally groundless and the Iraqi war was launched despite the opposition of the most member nations of the UN Security Council.
					
					 As the UK officially admitted the illegality of the Iraqi war which was unleashed by the U.S. fabrication called "threat of WMDs", it was proved once again that the U.S. is, indeed, the root cause of state terrorism, human rights violations and all misfortune in the world.
					
					 The U.S. can never evade the blame for the massacre of many innocent Iraqi civilians, chaos in Iraq and the international security threats such as Islamic extremism, terrorism and refugee crisis in the Mideast region.
					
					 The U.S. should be sternly judged by mankind as a heinous war criminal state and human rights abuser as it unhesitatingly hatched mean plots and perpetrated war of aggression in a bid to realize its ambition for domination.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S., styling itself an "international judge", is more undisguisedly committing interference in internal affairs of other countries and encroachment upon their sovereignty like a thief crying "stop thief!"
					
					 Recently, the U.S. dared take issue with the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK while talking about the "human rights issue", not content with resorting to the moves against it. This is the worst crime which can never be pardoned.
					
					 All facts clearly prove that the only way of defending the sovereignty of the country and nation is to bolster up one's own strength and how just the DPRK was when it decided to have the strongest military muscle for self-defense as now.
					
					 We will in the future, too, bolster up the war deterrent with the nuclear force as a pivot as firm as a rock and thus resolutely shatter the unheard-of vicious hostile acts and new war moves of the U.S. against the DPRK and firmly defend peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the region.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies Terms U.S. Worst Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies Terms U.S. Worst Human Rights Abuser
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies made public a statement on Wednesday as regards the recent serious human rights abuse in the U.S. that drew the world criticism.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Some days ago white police officers shot to death black men in Minnesota and Louisiana States, the U.S., sparking mass protests in some regions that left police officers dead and wounded in gunfire in Texas State.
					
					 The exchange of shootings between the protesters and the white police escalates to a serious racial conflict.
					
					 What is ridiculous is that Obama patronized the white police in his racial discrimination act, saying that the demented individual who carried out those attacks against the police officers is not representative of black Americans.
					
					 This shows Obama is the very one who fosters the human rights abuses in the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. is, indeed, the worst human rights abuser and the tundra of human rights as it is riddled with human rights abuses such as racial discrimination at the tacit connivance and under the patronage of the government.
					
					 This is a stark reality in the U.S., but the U.S. raised a hue and cry over the human rights situation of other countries, styling itself a "human rights judge", a gangster-like action mocking the international community.
					
					 Shamelessness and wickedness of the U.S. find their vivid expression in the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket.
					
					 Being taken aback by the ever-growing international prestige of the DPRK, the U.S. persistently resorts to the military threat and blackmail and heinous "human rights" racket against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. recently dared hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK by announcing the State Department's report related with the DPRK's "human rights" issue and a "list of targets of special sanctions" by the Department of Treasury pursuant to it.
					
					 It is a foolish dream for the U.S. to try to undermine the single-minded unity around the leader with base accusations against the supreme leadership of the DPRK and "bring down" its social system.
					
					 The more the U.S. ratchets up the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket, the firmer our single-minded unity centering around the leader will get and this will only make the Korean people harden their will to protect Korean-style socialism under which they enjoy genuine human rights.
					
					 The U.S. had better stop its human rights abuses before talking about other's "human rights" issue in the guise of deceptive "human rights champion".
					
					 The international community should bring the Obama group to the human rights court for patronizing the worst human rights abuses, to begin with.

articles.title: Washington's Ill-advised Sanctions Will Cause Catastrophic Consequences: Researcher of DPRK Foreign Ministry
articles.content:
Washington's Ill-advised Sanctions Will Cause Catastrophic Consequences: Researcher of DPRK Foreign Ministry
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Jong Nam Hyok, a researcher of the Institute for American Studies of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK, released a commentary titled "U.S. ill-advised sanctions will cause catastrophic consequences" on July 13.
					 The commentary said:
					
					 The U.S. administration staged the farce of announcing a "human rights report" and the "list of targets of special sanctions" malignantly slandering the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK on July 6, the first of its kind in history.
					
					 This is another serious strategic mistake made by the Obama administration whose tenure of office is to expire soon.
					
					 This blatant encroachment upon the sovereignty of the DPRK is the most vivid expression of the U.S. policy hostile to the DPRK and a product of its extremely self-opinionated point of view that anything favorable to its interests and taste should become a "just one", regardless of whether it is an act of violating international law or an immoral act. This is stunning the world public as it triggers off serious concern.
					
					 It is one of the principles recognized by international law that all sovereign states can never become targets of domestic jurisdiction of other countries and this principle is explicitly specified in the "UN convention on exemption of a state and its properties from jurisdiction" adopted on Dec. 2, 2004.
					
					 Paragraph 9 of Article 2 of the "code on crimes against human peace and security" written by the 6th United Nations Commission on International Law in 1953 clearly stipulates that if a country forces its will upon another country, takes steps to put political and economic pressure upon it and interferes in its internal affairs in a bid to seek interests, such acts are crimes against human peace and security.
					
					 The respect for sovereignty among countries is an elementary international practice before being a requirement of international law.
					
					 It is also a moral foundation for establishing international relations, which is vividly manifested through respect for the top representative of the dignity and interests of a country concerned.
					
					 Even the Bush II administration which earned an ill-fame for frequent invectives and diplomatic gaffes against leaderships of other countries didn't perpetrate such acts beyond common sense as invoking the domestic act of the U.S. against the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK that represents the destiny of its service personnel and people.
					
					 What the Obama administration did amounts to the self-acknowledgement of the total flop of its policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 It became universally accepted understanding long ago that the present U.S. administration's "strategic patience" is, in essence, a hands-off approach and Obama and his staff had neither ability nor will to handle the Korean issue.
					
					 When Obama bragged that he would "bring down" the social system of the DPRK, at the meeting with the YouTube video manufacturers in January last year, its subscribers in the U.S. aired their views that his careless words revealed his real intention and admitted to his failure in the policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. administration employed such a base method as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK in a bid to conceal its failure in the policy towards the DPRK but it brought to light its strategic incompetence and awkward position.
					
					 On July 6 a spokesperson for the U.S. State Department, when asked by a reporter if the recent sanctions measure would bring a boomerang effect, was reported to have answered that they took the step out of a lot of consideration. 
					
					 The U.S., however, failed to consider the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by the reckless action.
					
					 The DPRK government clarified its stand in the statement of the Foreign Ministry that the DPRK considers the U.S. act of hurting the dignity of the DPRK's supreme leadership as a declaration of a war and will take corresponding measures including the shut-down of all diplomatic contacts and channels with the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. provocative sanctions have driven the rock-bottom DPRK-U.S. relations into an inescapable mire and marked a new starting point in further escalating the vicious cycle of tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK is now left with no option but to take new tough measures to defend the dignity of the supreme leadership and interests of the DPRK under the present situation in which the U.S. political and military provocations to stifle it have reached an extreme phase and there is the only way for it to settle accounts with the latter by force.
					
					 There is no guarantee that Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill to be staged when the situation on the peninsula remains tenser than ever before and the DPRK-U.S. relations are at the lowest ebb will not create another explosive situation. 
					
					 The U.S. wrong option is bound to boomerang.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Lao President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Lao President
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Lao President Bounnang Vorachith on July 8.
					 The president in the message extended sincere and warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK on behalf of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and the government and people of Laos and on his own behalf.
					
					 Fresh successes would be achieved one after another in the work for defending the country, building a powerful country and improving its people's living standard under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, the message said, expressing belief that new greater achievements would be made, in particular, in the efforts for protecting peace and security on the Korean peninsula on the principle of the great unity of the entire nation.
					
					 It expressed pleasure over the fact that the traditional good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries have steadily developed to bring substantial benefits to the peoples of the two countries and contribute to defending regional peace and security and developing cooperative ties.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and greater success in his noble work.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of C.C., Communist Party of India (Marxist)
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of C.C., Communist Party of India (Marxist)
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a congratulatory message from Sitaram Yechury, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist), on July 5.
					 The message reads:
					
					 I warmly congratulate you on your election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK on behalf of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist).
					
					 I highly appreciate all successes made by the Korean people in their struggle to defend socialism from all challenges of the imperialists and build a powerful country under your wise leadership.
					
					 Availing myself of this significant opportunity, I express belief that great success will be made in all your work and the relations between the two parties will grow stronger in the future.

articles.title: Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Envoys Here
articles.content:
Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Envoys Here
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets and congratulatory letters from diplomatic envoys here on his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK. They included Indonesian Ambassador Bambang Hiendrasto, Indian Ambassador Jasminder Kasturia, Malaysian Ambassador Mohammad Nizan Bin Mohammad and Osunmakinde Edward Dolapo, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Nigerian Embassy. 
					 They were handed to officials concerned separately.

articles.title: Sci-tech Achievements made by University Teachers in DPRK
articles.content:
Sci-tech Achievements made by University Teachers in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Teachers and researchers of Kim Chaek University of Technology in the DPRK have recently made a lot of sci-tech achievements conducive to the nation's economic development.
					 They established an alloy metal ball continuous casting process based on domestic technology at the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex and completed the preparations for trial operation of coal briquette drying oven and kiln and gas producer at the Mirim Tilery.
					
					 They also decided on a plan for sea-wave generator installation and developed a Korean-style high-speed circuit-breaker, operating control system, permanent-magnet synchronous motor, traction converter and control program for subway train.
					
					 Besides, they designed and manufactured more than 150 equipment and facilities of 30 kinds for putting the Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory's production processes on an automated and unmanned basis while realizing the home production of various analyzers.

articles.title: Laser-based Sapling Processing Device Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Laser-based Sapling Processing Device Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Laser-based sapling processing device was developed by the High-Tech Institute of Kim Il Sung University.
					 It helps drastically improve physiological condition of saplings and raise their rooting rate.
					
					 Rooting rate of various species of saplings, processed with laser, increased 1.5 to 1.8 times more than before.
					
					 The processed saplings are highly resistant to virus.
					
					 According to Choe Sang Jin, a section chief of the institute, the device costs much lower than foreign-made ones and is easily applicable, powered by 12-voltage battery.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Charade Staged by U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Regime
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Charade Staged by U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Regime
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime held another "event" in a bid to cover up their true colors as provocateurs of the Korean war on June 25, 1950.
					 It was staged in the "Korean War Memorial Park" in Washington.
					
					 It was sponsored by "the Foundation for Commemorating Entry into the Korean War" and the south Korean puppet "embassy" in the U.S. 
					
					 Nobody knows when the foundation was established and to which it belongs.
					
					 The program of this event was just to call by name the volunteers who were killed while serving as mercenaries of U.S. forces during the Korean war.
					
					 On the previous day there took place a "memorial event" with attendance of some old men who survived in the war.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday says: 
					
					 Staging such burlesques would not help the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime distort the history of the Korean war in the 1950s in which they sustained a disgraceful defeat.
					
					 The Korean war was launched by the Syngman Rhee puppet regime at the U.S. instigation, pursuant to its U.S. scenario. 
					
					 This time, too, the U.S. held such a farce in a bid to describe its start of war, act of aggression, as "southward invasion" by the DPRK only to reveal its true colors as aggressor. 
					
					 Having suffered the horrible nightmare of defeat for the last several decades, the U.S. changed its scenarios from a few years back. It has staged charades one after another, talking nonsense that now is the time to term the Korean war which had been called "forgotten war" "forgotten victory." This, however, resulted in hyping up the U.S. defeat.
					
					 Their desperate efforts to paint their history of defeat as that of winner would only add shine to the history of victory won by the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Dismisses S. Korean Puppet Forces' Story about "Nuclear Threat from North"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Dismisses S. Korean Puppet Forces' Story about "Nuclear Threat from North"
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces' noisy  trumpeting about the "nuclear threat from the north" is no more than sheer sophism to cover up their true colors as servants for foreign nuclear maniacs and the worst confrontation and war fanatics and divert the public attention elsewhere, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 Dependence on outside forces and sycophancy and treachery are the intrinsic physiology of the puppet regime. It is the inveterate bad habit of this regime to cling tighter to the coattails of its American master whenever it finds itself in a pretty fix and more desperately escalate the confrontation with the compatriots in the north in collusion with him, the article notes, and goes on:. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces' hue and cry over "threat" from someone at a time when a dramatic change has taken place in the DPRK's strategic position is no more than their last-ditch efforts to stem the trend of the times and escape their doom by boosting the cooperation with the U.S. in their scenario for invading the north. 
					
					 Their false propaganda is no more than a cynical ploy to justify their bankrupt policy of confrontation and evade the responsibility for the catastrophe of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 If the puppet group is allowed to persist in all sorts of acts of treachery, pursuing cooperation with outside forces and the confrontation with the compatriots in the north, utterly indifferent to the destiny of the nation, the Koreans will not be able to escape a nuclear disaster, much less improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The nuclear racket and saber-rattling frantically stepped up by the Park Geun Hye group against the DPRK in collusion with outside forces would only compel it to bolster up its nuclear deterrent for self-defense at an increased speed.
					
					 The puppet group would be well advised to properly know the DPRK's changed strategic position and stop foolish acts to mislead the public opinion.

articles.title: AI Urges S. Korean Regime to Open to Public Situation of Abducted DPRK Women Citizens
articles.content:
AI Urges S. Korean Regime to Open to Public Situation of Abducted DPRK Women Citizens
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Amnesty International (AI) made public a statement urging the south Korean regime to open to public the situation of the abducted DPRK women citizens, according to CBS of south Korea on Tuesday.
					 There are many suspicions and claims about the women citizens but their voices have not been heard, the statement said, urging the south Korean regime to immediately allow them to meet with their families in the north.

articles.title: Zika Virus Case Occurs in S. Korea
articles.content:
Zika Virus Case Occurs in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Another Zika virus case occurred in south Korea on July 10, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 A man in his 50s, who had lived abroad, was reportedly found infected with Zika virus.

articles.title: S. Koreans Call for Resumption of Tour of Mt. Kumgang
articles.content:
S. Koreans Call for Resumption of Tour of Mt. Kumgang
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Inhabitants of Kosong County, south Korean Kangwon Province held a rally in Seoul on Monday demanding the resumption of tour of Mt. Kumgang.
					 Speakers there criticized the "government" for persistently defying the resumption of tour of Mt. Kumgang.
					
					 A special law should be instituted for resuming the tour and damage caused by the suspension of the tour should be compensated, they urged.
					
					 They declared they would carry on their actions until their demand is met.

articles.title: Third Meeting of 23rd C.C., Korean Youth League in Japan Held
articles.content:
Third Meeting of 23rd C.C., Korean Youth League in Japan Held
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The third meeting of the 23rd Central Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on July 7.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the league, and members of the C.C., the league.
					
					 The meeting discussed the measures for thoroughly carrying out the tasks set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his May 25 letter and taking the lead in implementing the decision of the enlarged meeting of the third meeting of the 23rd Central Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					
					 Kim Yong Ju in a report said Kim Jong Un made sure that the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League sent a message of greeting to the conference for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean Youth League in Japan, and invited a delegation of its officials to the homeland to visit the construction site of the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station so that they might grasp the charging spirit of the youth in Songun era.
					
					 He referred to the tasks for boosting the single-minded unity of the ranks of the Korean Youth League in Japan as required by the patriotic movement which entered a new phase, staging mass movement in keeping with the emulation drive waged by the branches of Chongryon and playing a vanguard role in carrying out the three-point patriotic tasks.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was read out there.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Calls for Successfully Holding Great National Conference for Reunification
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Calls for Successfully Holding Great National Conference for Reunification
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., on June 30 posted an article written by editorial board member Jang Kwang Son in support of the holding of a great national conference for reunification.
					 The article said:
					
					 The north proposed to hold a great national conference of the authorities in the north and the south and representatives of political parties and organizations and individual personages from the north and the south and abroad before and after August 15 this year. This is drawing great attention of compatriots at home and abroad.
					
					 However, the Park Geun Hye regime is openly rejecting the proposal, terming it "propaganda offensive."
					
					 This means the complete scrapping of the June 4 joint statement which calls for the great national unity.
					
					 The article called on all organizations and individuals aspiring after peace on the Korean peninsula to actively respond to the north's proposal.

articles.title: Organization of Koreans in U.S. Welcomes Great National Conference for Reunification
articles.content:
Organization of Koreans in U.S. Welcomes Great National Conference for Reunification
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Central and Southern Regional Federation of Koreans in the U.S. issued a statement on July 9 in support of the holding of a great national conference for reunification for peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula. 
					 The great national conference for reunification will show the U.S. imperialists the will for great unity of the Korean nation dynamically advancing to the road of achieving independent and peaceful reunification, the statement noted, adding:
					
					 The conference will offer even the south side ruling quarters dominated by the anti-reunification conservative forces an opportunity for making a new start for independence, peace and reunification of the country.
					
					 The federation will make all efforts for the successful holding of the great national conference for reunification.

articles.title: Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Introduced by Polish Organization
articles.content:
Works of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Introduced by Polish Organization
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Vol. 1 and Vol. 2 of Part 1 the Anti-Japanese Revolution of "With the Century", reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung, and his work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" and leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" were posted by the Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association on its website on July 7 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The work "10-Point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country" published on April 6, Juche 82 (1993) comprehensively indicates the ways of achieving the great national unity such as the need for all Koreans to found a reunified state in unity and the issues of achieving unity on the basis of patriotism and the spirit of national independence and promoting co-existence, co-prosperity and common interests and stopping all partisan disputes fanning up split and confrontation between compatriots, the necessity for the north and the south to trust and get united with each other and issues of not rejecting people because of different isms but joining hands on the road of national reunification.
					
					 The work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung", published on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), is a great programme for the party building and activities as it reviews with pride the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea which hewed out a new path of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and indicates the road of developing the party into his party forever.
					
					 30 photos dealing with the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung were posted on the website.
					
					 Articles including the one titled "Believing in people as in Heaven" and 5 Korean songs including the immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung", "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and "Generalissimo Kim Il Sung Is with Us" were posted on the website.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered at DPRK Missions Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered at DPRK Missions Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings, seminars, photo and book exhibitions and film shows took place at the DPRK missions in Cambodia, India and Equatorial Guinea between July 1 and 7 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were their works, and photos and books introducing the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Invited there were figures from all walks of life, members of organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and organizations for the study of the Juche idea in the relevant countries.
					
					 Present there were officials of the DPRK missions abroad.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and their full-length pictures at the DPRK missions in those countries and paid tribute to them.
					
					 The deputy prime minister in charge of Royal Palace of Cambodia who is chairman of the Cambodian committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Il Sung said that he was the father of socialist Korea who turned the DPRK into a dignified independent and sovereign state with invincible might.
					
					 He praised Kim Il Sung as a benefactor of the Cambodian people as he extended sincere support and solidarity to peace and security of Cambodia.
					
					 The administrative department director of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea said that the President was the eternal leader of the DPRK who provided the Korean people with an independent and happy life, adding that he is always alive in the hearts of progressive mankind as he performed immortal exploits for global independence.
					
					 Korean films "Kimilsungia", "Treasures of Eternal Value in Praise of Sun" and "Tower of the Juche Idea" were shown.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Russia
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Partizansk City Committee for Remembering Comrade Kim Il Sung of Russia and the Russian Khabarovsk Territorial Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and Experience in Socialist Construction of the DPRK held remembrance meetings and the Nakhodka City Committee for Remembering Comrade Kim Il Sung of Russia held a seminar on his exploits on July 7 on the 22nd anniversary of his demise.
					 On display in the venues of the events were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books and photos introducing efforts of the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The chairman of the above-said Partizansk City committee who is chairman of the City Assembly said that Kim Il Sung was the outstanding leader who made great contributions to the development of the DPRK and the struggle of the oppressed people for national liberation from colony.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu who is chairman of the Russian Khabarovsk Territorial Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and Experience in Socialist Construction of the DPRK said Kim Il Sung was the great statesman who liberated Korea and built a genuine socialist state.
					
					 The chairman of the Nakhodka City Committee for Remembering Comrade Kim Il Sung who is first secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territorial Region of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said Kim Il Sung was the great man who firmly protected the destiny of the country and the nation and his great exploits will shine forever in the hearts of the Korean people and other progressives.
					
					 The secretary general of the Nakhodka City Committee for Remembering Comrade Kim Il Sung who is secretary of the Nakhodka City Committee of the Maritime Territorial Region of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said even now people praise Kim Il Sung as the most prominent leader representing the 20th century, peerlessly great man and great sage of mankind.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered by Pakistani Personages
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered by Pakistani Personages
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting for remembering President Kim Il Sung took place in Karachi, Pakistan on July 6.
					 Displayed at the venue of the meeting were photos documenting the exploits of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and books and photos introducing Juche Korea.
					
					 Present there were figures of various political parties and organizations, the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association, the Pakistan Association for Self-Reliance Studies and masses.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The secretary general of the Karachi branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 He said that the world progressives are boundlessly revering Kim Il Sung though 22 years have passed since his demise, lauding his great devotion to the Korean revolution and cause of human independence.
					
					 The Juche idea, the Songun idea founded by the President serves as precious guidelines for progressive humankind struggling for global independence, the reporter stressed.
					
					 The speakers noted that the banner of independence held aloft by Kim Il Sung still encourages not only the Korean people building a socialist power but also progressive mankind struggling for independence and justice. He was the greatest man in the idea, leadership and virtue, they emphasized.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Swedish Personages
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Swedish Personages
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- A meeting, seminar, photo and book exhibition and film show took place in Stockholm on July 5 and 7 under the sponsorship of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association and the Communist Party in Sweden on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the feats of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were their works, and photos and books introducing Juche Korea.
					
					 The participants laid bunches of flowers before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and art works depicting them and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Oskar Molleby, co-chairman of the committee for remembering Kim Il Sung who doubles as chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that Kim Il Sung, after embarking on the road of revolutionary struggle in his early years, rallied the Korean people to liberate the country and beat back the U.S. imperialists in the great Fatherland Liberation War. He praised Kim Il Sung as a distinguished strategist.
					
					 Under his wise guidance the DPRK met all challenges of the enemies and built an independent and prosperous country by its own efforts, the chief stressed.
					
					 Christer Lundgren, co-chairman of the committee for remembering Kim Il Sung who doubles as chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, noted that the distinguished feats the President performed by contributing to the world people's struggle for national independence, peace and social emancipation against imperialism will be immortal.
					
					 A letter and message to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events.
					
					 The participants watched Korean film "Song of Sun Will Be Everlasting."

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Denmark
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Denmark
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Danish preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu sponsored a meeting in Copenhagen on July 7 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venue of the meeting were photos documenting the exploits of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Exhibited there were their works.
					
					 Present there were figures and members of the Communist Party in Denmark, the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association and the preparatory committee.
					
					 The participants laid bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the preparatory committee who doubles as chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association praised Kim Il Sung as an outstanding political activist and great leader of the Korean people, saying that the feats he performed for the cause of human independence will be immortal along with the cause of independence which is making steady progress.
					
					 A message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted there.
					
					 The participants watched Korean film "Song of Sun Will Be Everlasting."

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Demise Anniversary Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Demise Anniversary Commemorated Abroad
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Personages of the governments, political parties and organizations of Nepal, Bangladesh, UK, Germany and Uganda visited the DPRK missions in those countries between July 6 and 8 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They included the vice prime minister of Nepal who is minister for Women, Children and Social Welfare and general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), the former prime minister of Nepal and leader of the C.C., the Nepal Communist Party (United Marxist-Leninist), the chief of the International Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist), the secretary general of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Committee of Nepal, the chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association, the chairman of the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal, the chairman of the Nepali Literary Forum for the Study of Songun Politics, the chairman of the Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics, the chairman of the  Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh and minister of Civil Aviation and Tourism, the general secretary of the C.C., the Bangladesh Communist Party, the general secretary of the C.C., the Socialist Party o
					
					 f Bangla
					
					 desh, the secretary general of the Bangladesh Jatiya Party, the president of the Bangladesh People's League, the chairman of Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, the chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, the chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, the general secretary of the C.C., the New Communist Party of Britain, the general secretary of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), the chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany, the chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement, the secretary general of the Ugandan People's Congress and the chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche idea.
					
					 The visitors laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their full-length pictures before paying tribute to them.
					
					 The co-chairman of the Council of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, the general manager of the Golden Trip Travel Service Co. Ltd., the secretary general of the Zhonghwa Energy Fund Commission and the chairperson of the Emperor Group of Hong Kong of China sent floral baskets to the DPRK missions.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Denounce U.S. and S. Korea for Anti-DPRK Invectives
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Denounce U.S. and S. Korea for Anti-DPRK Invectives
 Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on July 7 in support of the statement of a spokesman for the DPRK government and the answer of a spokesman for the Institute for American Studies of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 A spokesman for the DPRK government in a statement warned the U.S. and south Korea against talking about "denuclearization of the north" and resorting to deceptive action 
					
					 As of now the U.S. is declining the DPRK's just demand for replacing the Armistice Agreement by a peace agreement under the absurd precondition of "north's scrapping of its nuclear program first."
					
					 The Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea clarified its policy stand that the DPRK would not use nukes first unless others infringe on its sovereignty but sincerely implement the duty for nuclear non-proliferation before the international community and make every effort to realize the denuclearization of the world.
					
					 A spokesman for the Institute for American Studies of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK strongly denounced the U.S. as regards the claim being floated in the U.S. that "third offset strategy" should be applied to the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The "third offset strategy" advanced by the U.S. military in 2014 is an expression of extreme hostility of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is fully capable of making all the U.S. brainchild go belly-up determinedly, to say nothing of the "third offset strategy."
					
					 We strongly reject the sophism of "denuclearization of the north" and criminal and reckless acts of the U.S. and south Korean authorities and fully support the statement of the spokesman for the DPRK government and the answer of the spokesman for the Institute for American Studies of the DPRK Foreign Ministry reflecting the principled stand of the DPRK.

articles.title: Ri Yong Ho recibe cartas credenciales del representante de UNIDO

Ri Yong Ho recibe cartas credenciales del representante de UNIDO

articles.title: Portavoz de MINREX califica EE.UU. de pais criminal de guerra y violador de DDHH
articles.content:
Portavoz de MINREX califica EE.UU. de pais criminal de guerra y violador de DDHH
Pyongyang, 13 de julio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada el dia 13 en relacion con que en Gran Bretana fue publicado el informe oficial revelando la injusticia de la guerra de Irak, el portavoz del MINREX de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio la respuesta que senala en particular:
					El comite de averiguacion de los verdaderos aspectos de la guerra de Irak, organizado en 2009 por el gobierno britanico, hizo publico, al cabo de 7 anos de su trabajo, un informe sacando la conclusion de que fue ilegal e injusta la guerra de Irak provocada en 2003 por Estados Unidos.
					
					No tenian pruebas las insistencias de EE.UU. en la "produccion de armas bioquimicas" y la "amenaza de las armas de exterminio masivo", que se servian del motivo directo de la guerra, senalo el documento y aclaro que la guerra iraqui fue perpetrada a fuerzas pese a la oposicion de la mayoria de los paises miembros del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					Este reconocimiento oficial de Gran Bretana sobre la ilegalidad de la guerra iraqui vuelve a testimoniar el hecho de que EE.UU. es el autor del terrorismo estatal, la violacion de DDHH y los sufrimientos del mundo entero.
					
					EE.UU. no puede liberarse jamas de la responsabilidad de haber producido la muerte de numerosos iraquies inocentes y la confusion de la situacion de Irak, asi como la amenaza de seguridad en la arena internacional incluyendo el extremismo islamico, el terrorismo y la crisis de refugiados que se reinan en el Medio Oriente.
					
					EE.UU., malvado criminal de guerra y violador de DDHH, que cometio sin vacilacion alguna las viles intrigas y la bandidesca guerra de agresion para lograr su ambicion dominacionista, debe ser sentenciado severamente por la humanidad.
					
					Pero, este pais mal perpetra mas abiertamente la intervencion en los asuntos internos y la violacion de soberania de otros paises, actuando como juez internacional.
					
					Insatisfecho por las maniobras anti-RPDC, EE.UU. ofendio recientemente la maxima dignidad de la RPDC hablando del "problema de DDHH", lo que constituye un imperdonable crimen de categoria especial.
					
					Todos los hechos arriba mencionados demuestran claramente que el unico camino para defender la soberania del pais y la nacion es fortalecer las fuerzas propias y que fueron muy justas nuestras medidas para disponernos de la poderosisima capacidad militar autodefensiva de hoy.
					
					Tambien en el futuro, consolidaremos mas firmemente el disuasivo de guerra basado en las fuerzas armadas nucleares, de manera que frustraremos sin piedad los perversos actos hostiles de EE.UU. y sus maniobras de provocacion de guerra y defenderemos confiablemente la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.

articles.title: Vocero de AEDHC califica a EE.UU. de peor violador de DDHH
articles.content:
Vocero de AEDHC califica a EE.UU. de peor violador de DDHH
Pyongyang, 13 de julio (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que en EE.UU. ocurrio otro incidente de violacion flagrante de DDHH que causa gran repudio de todo el mundo, el portavoz de la Asociacion de Estudio de Derechos Humanos de Corea (AEDHC) hizo publica el dia 13 una declaracion.
					El texto sigue:
					
					Recientemente, en los Estados de Minesota y Luisiana de Estados Unidos los policias blancos fusilaron a plena luz del dia a los negros inocentes. 
					
					Estos incidentes desataron las manifestaciones de protesta en varias zonas, inclusive el Estado de Texas donde los policias antimotines resultaron muertos o lesionados por el disparo de personas armadas. 
					
					Se exacerba la tension entre los manifestantes y los policias blancos y la situacion se extiende al grave enfrentamiento racial. 
					
					Lo mas ridiculo del caso es que el presidente estadounidense Obama defendio la discriminacion racial de los policias blancos, diciendo que el delincuente que disparo al policia es un loco y no representa a la poblacion negra. 
					
					La realidad demuestra que el autor que fomenta la violacion de derechos humanos en la sociedad estadounidense es el mismo presidente Obama. 
					
					En EE.UU., peor violador e infierno de DDHH del mundo, se cometen los crimenes de violacion de DDHH de toda indole, incluso la discriminacion racial, bajo el amparo e instigacion directos del gobierno. 
					
					Sin embargo, EE.UU. critica la situacion de DDHH de otros paises actuando como si fuera el "juez de DDHH". 
					
					El cinismo y la crueldad de EE.UU. se demuestran claramente en su campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC. 
					
					Aturdido ante la elevacion de la posicion de la RPDC en la arena internacional, el imperio recurre obstinadamente a la campana de "DDHH" ejerciendo al mismo tiempo la amenaza y chantaje nucleares contra el pais socialista. 
					
					En el reciente informe del Departamento de Estado sobre el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC y en la conexa lista de objetos de sancion especial del Departamento de Finanzas, se atrevio a ofender la dignidad de la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC. 
					
					EE.UU. intenta quebrantar la unidad monolitica de la RPDC en torno a su Direccion Suprema y lograr el "derrocamiento del regimen norcoreano" mediante las ofensas y calumnias contra la Direccion Suprema, pero esto es una ilusion vana. 
					
					Cuanto mas se intensifique la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de EE.UU., tanto mas se consolidara la unidad monolitica de la RPDC en torno a su lider y se redoblara la voluntad del pueblo coreano de defender el regimen socialista donde se aseguran los verdaderos derechos humanos. 
					
					EE.UU. debe arreglar primero la situacion interna de DDHH, antes de hablar del "problema de DDHH" de otros bajo el enganoso cartel de "defensa de DDHH". 
					
					La sociedad internacional debe someter primero a la camarilla de Obama al banquillo de acusados del tribunal de DDHH.

articles.title: Sancion anti-RPDC de EE.UU. traera consecuencias catastroficas
articles.content:
Sancion anti-RPDC de EE.UU. traera consecuencias catastroficas
Pyongyang, 13 de julio (ACNC) -- El investigador del Instituto para Asuntos Norteamericanos del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Jong Nam Hyok, hizo publico el dia 13 un comentario intitulado "La imprudente sancion de EE.UU. traera consecuencias catastroficas". 
					El texto senala:
					
					El pasado dia 6, la administracion norteamericana publico el "informe de DDHH" y la "lista de objetos de sancion especial" ofendiendo mas brutalmente que nunca la dignidad de la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC. 
					
					Es otro grave error estrategico de la administracion Obama en visperas del fin de su mandato. 
					
					La violacion de la soberania de la RPDC es expresion mas coherente de la politica de hostilidad a la RPDC y el resultado del criterio egoista y extremado de EE.UU., segun el cual son "justas" todas las cosas que convengan a sus intereses y gusto, sean acciones ilicitas internacionales o inmorales. Esto causa gran preocupacion de la opinion publica mundial. 
					
					Un Estado soberano no puede ser objeto del poder judicial de otro pais, lo cual es el principio reconocido por la ley internacional. Tal principio esta indicado claramente en el Convenio de la ONU sobre el Derecho a la Exencion Judicial del Estado y sus Propiedades", aprobado el 2 de diciembre de 2004.
					
					La clausula 9 del articulo 2 del Codigo sobre el Crimen contra la Paz y la Seguridad de la Humanidad, elaborado en 1953 por la 6a Comision de la Ley Internacional de la ONU,  tambien estipula que intervenir en los asuntos internos de otro pais tomando las medidas coercitivas politicas y economicas imponiendole su voluntad para satisfacer sus propios intereses resulta un crimen contra la paz y la seguridad de la humanidad. 
					
					El respeto a la soberania entre los paises es una costumbre internacional y fundamento moral para el establecimiento de las relaciones internacionales, antes de ser una demanda de la ley internacional. Y esto se expresa concentradamente a traves del respeto al maximo representante de la dignidad e intereses del pais correspondiente. 
					
					Ni la administracion Bush II, que se gano la mala fama por sus erroneos discursos diplomaticas sobre las direcciones de otros paises, se atrevio a movilizar la ley nacional para difamar directamente nuestra maxima dignidad, lo todo de nuestro destino. 
					
					Pues, el insulto de la administracion Obama sobre la maxima dignidad de la RPDC significa reconocer por si mismo el fracaso total de su politica sobre el pais socialista. 
					
					Hace mucho tiempo, se ha establecido en la arena internacional la concepcion de que la "paciencia estrategica" de la actual administracion norteamericana no tiene remedio alguno y de que Obama y sus asesores no tienen la capacidad ni voluntad de tratar el problema coreano.
					
					En enero del ano pasado, Obama se reunio con los productores de "YouTube" y les dijo con fanfarroneria que "derrumbara" el regimen de la RPDC. Entonces, en el interior del territorio norteamericano se escucharon las opiniones de que el presidente mostro su verdadera intencion al hablar sin pensar en las consecuencias y sus palabras reconocen el fracaso de la politica sobre Corea.
					
					Recientemente, la administracion norteamericana recurrio a la sucia manera de menoscabar la dignidad de la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC para disimular el fracaso de su politica sobre esta. Al contrario, demostro por si misma su incapacidad estrategica y situacion miserable.
					
					El dia 6, el portavoz del Departamento de Estado de EE.UU. respondio a un reportero, quien le pregunto si las recientes medidas de sancion no traerian resultado contraproducente, que "hemos tomado esas medidas despues de pensar mucho".
					
					Pero, EE.UU. no se imagina del todo las consecuencias catastroficas que emanen de su conducta imprudente.
					
					Ya el gobierno de la RPDC patentizo por conducto de la declaracion de su cancilleria su posicion de que considera como declaracion de guerra el acto de EE.UU. de difamar la dignidad de la Direccion Suprema y tomara las contramedidas, incluso el cierre de contacto diplomatico con EE.UU. y sus canales.
					
					Las sanciones de caracter provocativo de EE.UU. han sido el nuevo punto de partida que lleva al abismo sin salida las relaciones bilaterales casi en el nivel cero y empuja la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al circulo vicioso de agravacion de tension.
					
					La realidad de hoy, en que llego al extremo la provocacion politico-militar de EE.UU. destinada a aplastar a la RPDC y les queda a ambas partes la liquidacion de cuentas mediante el uso de la fuerza, obliga a la RPDC a tomar nuevas medidas intransigentes para defender la maxima dignidad y los intereses del Estado.
					
					Nadie puede asegurar que no ocurrira otro incidente, que conduzca la situacion a la fase de explosion, con motivo de los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Ulji Freedom Guardian" que se efectuaran cuando estan en el peor estado la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y las relaciones RPDC-EE.UU.
					
					Todos los desastres, que produzca la opcion erronea de EE.UU., recaeran sobre este imperio.
